info.name: IntraVox
info.summary: Build a modern intranet with drag-and-drop pages
info.description:
IntraVox transforms Nextcloud into a full-featured intranet platform. Create professional pages with a visual drag-and-drop editor — no coding required.
**Key features:** * Visual page editor with drag-and-drop widget placement * Flexible grid layouts (1–5 columns) * Rich widget library: text, images, videos, links, people, files, and more * Multi-language support with per-language content folders * Navigation editor with megamenu and sidebar options * Personal RSS feed for following page updates * Department-based access control via GroupFolders ACL * Demo content to get started quickly * Seamless Nextcloud integration (theming, users, groups, files)
**Requirements:** * Nextcloud 32 or 33 * PHP 8.2 or higher * GroupFolders app (installed and enabled)
**Ideal for:** * Company intranets and news portals * Department knowledge bases * Internal communication and documentation * SharePoint-to-Nextcloud migrations
Built with Vue 3 for a fast, modern, and secure experience.
info.author: Rik Dekker
